description:
The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro’s way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro’s determination and tries to pave the way for him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les larmes de Marco. La fraternité de l’équipage de Barbe Blanche
Marco no Namida! Shirohige Kaizokudan no Kizuna
Marco`s Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!
Marcos Tränen! – Das Band der Whitebeard-Priatenbande
دموع ماركو! رابطة قراصنة اللّحية البيضاء
マルコの涙! 白ひげ海賊団の絆
